content.description: This is not really a waste of time but not exactly your best use of time either. Start matched on the good rail, do a big move up and right, and top out the slab. The landing isn't ideal but not too bad.
content.location: It is on the left side of Hector's Big Bro.

content.description: Two in the Pink is probably the best problem in the knoll. Start on the big undercling block, and move up on good underclings until you get to the beautiful finger lock (hence the name). It has a pretty spicy topout. This is lovely stuff. It's wild because the rock down low is chossssss, but up top it's super quality. There is a fairly treacherous landing. We laid down sticks to make it safer, but bring a lot of pads.
content.location: It is in the middle of the big overhang.

content.description: This is the biggest/tallest/best boulder in Hemlock Knoll with the most potential. It is pretty chossy low down but super solid in the middle and on top. Depending where you start, there can be 15-30 foot problems. Definitely this has at least 4 more problems on it, and it's worth further development and cleaning. The landings aren't ideal though. Bring plenty of pads, and get creative.
